#summary How to Contribute to the perfSONAR PS project

= Introduction =

Everyone is encouraged to contribute to the perfSONAR-PS project. The perfSONAR-PS project is meant to be an inclusive community project. That said, we want to make sure that the components included in the perfSONAR-PS library are high quality and follow good coding practices.

Email i2-perfsonar@internet2.edu to request being added as a contributor to this project. 

= Contribute as a user =
Please submit bug reports to the Issue tracker: http://code.google.com/p/perfsonar-ps/issues/list

= Contribute Documentation =
In particular, we need help supporting additional network device drivers or other flavors of Unix.

= Contribute Data Analysis Tools =
We need help in this area.

= Contribute Other Code =
Bug fixes, enhancements, etc.


= License =
All code submitted to perfSONAR-PS must be released under the BSD license:
